title: PyPREP: A Python implementation of the preprocessing pipeline (PREP) for EEG data.
description: PyPrep is a Python library to facilitate preprocessing of EEG data. More information can be found at pyprep.readthedocs.io.

creators.affiliation: Center for Adaptive Rationality, Max Planck Institute for Human Development, Berlin, Germany
creators.name: Appelhoff, Stefan
